item.title: Release 1.3.0 available
item.description: Apache Ozone 1.3.0 is released with following features: Erasure Coding - V1 support (Online reconstruction support) Container balancer Limit number of rocksdb instances to 1 per disk on high-density datanodes Ozone S3 Multi-tenancy Support S3 Grpc improvements for metadata path Filesystem Optimized and Object Store bucket layout types This is a generally available (GA) release. It represents a point of API stability and quality that we consider production-ready. Image credit: Grand Canyon - South Rim - Mather Point by G.
